Text:
Just can't spam enough, can you?
If you're posting something which requires downloading a *License* then it's SPAM.

Free, or not, downloading any video which requires a license is a dangerous thing in the file sharing community. http://www.theregister.co.uk/2005/01/13/drm_trojan/
http://www.pcworld.com/article/id,119016-page,1/article.html
Just say "NO" to licensed torrents!

I suppose the I could have said the same thing, but it wouldn't be polite and help people understand just why licensed bullshit is just that -- bullshit. But it's free, so it must be good, right?
Something that is "free" yet has a string attached to it is perfectly harmless, right? Yet...what purpose does the string serve?
Something that is "free" but still has strings attached to it isn't free. FREE is when there are no strings attached!
